casebody.data:
CHARLES B. HOFFMAN, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. ALFRED L. SEATON, Defendant and Respondent.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Freedman and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided November 30, 1872. S. E. Lyon & W. H. Peckham, for appellant. John E. Burrill, for respondent. Appeal from a judgment in favor of defendant in an action brought by plaintiff for an accounting in regard to the purchase and sale of gold by defendant for plaintiff. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Barbour, Ch. J., Freedman and Sedgwick, JJ., concurring.
